***DAILY LOCATIONS - SUNDAY 7 JULY 2019***

Good morning everyone!! Here are Sunday’s listed MOBILE speed camera locations.

WHAT WE URGE YOU TO DO
- Please alert us via an INBOXED name or VP if you become aware of any speed traps. 
- Take the time to read the below sections. IT IS FOR YOUR OWN BENEFIT!!

TODAY'S LIST
- 50 listed locations. 
- Rural roads aren't typically included. 
- There may be speed cameras set up in locations not in the attached list, though the list is reliable.

SET UP TIMES
- Early morning set ups start as early as 4.30am. Usually two operators nabbing both sides. Currently almost daily. 
- Late night set ups beyond 9pm finish as late as 12am. Usually two operators nabbing both sides. Currently rare. 
- All other times typically range from 8am until 9pm, give or take 15 minutes. 

SPEED CAMERA INFO
- Either set up inside or outside the vehicle. 
- Can nab up to 4 lanes both sides, provided there is no big median strip or obstructions. 
- All speed camera vehicles are white utes, and mostly Isuzu Dmax utes. 

ALICE
- Two speed camera trailers are now in use, referred to as "ALICE" by WAPF. 
- Can stay mounted up to any location for up to 5 days. 
- Usually reported to us as they’re being set up. 

FIXED CAMERAS
- These locations are all advertised on WAPF’s website. 
 
SAFETY name
- Use the list wisely, drive safely and don't cop an infringement!! 

LINK TO WEBSITE:

https://www.police.wa.gov.au/Traffic/Cameras/Camera-locations

***BURSWOOD - ROAD CLOSURES - AFL EVENT***

Time: 11am until 10pm 

Event: AFL March, Eagles vs Dockers 

Where: OPTUS STADIUM 🏉🏟

Road closure in and around the stadium.
No drop off at stadium. Bike cops patrolling illegal stops and phone users. 

Roads closed: Victoria Park Drive, Marlee Loop, Camfield Drive, Roger Mackay Drive near The Camfield.

Uber/drop off location: Crown Casino or Nelson Ave in East Perth. 😀😀

Keep safe and enjoy your night. Plan your journeys accordingly to avoid unexpected detours and delays!!
